books.title: The Old Man and the Sea
books.author: Ernest Hemingway
books.content: The story of an aging fisherman who battles a giant marlin far out in the Gulf Stream. It is a tale about courage and dignity.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.content: A look at the entire history of the human race, exploring how we have evolved and how different cultures were created.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.author: Dan Brown
books.content: A thrilling mystery that begins with a murder in the Louvre Museum and leads a professor on a hunt for a secret society.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.content: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and begins his magical journey at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.content: The famous story of Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy, exploring love, class, and social rules in 19th-century England.

books.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
books.author: Stieg Larsson
books.content: A journalist and a young computer hacker work together to solve a 40-year-old missing person case from a rich, complicated family.

books.author: George Orwell
books.content: A warning about a future society ruled by a powerful and watching government, and one man's struggle for freedom and thought.

books.title: The Maze Runner
books.author: James Dashner
books.content: A teenage boy wakes up with no memory inside a huge maze, where he and other teens must fight to survive and find a way out.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.content: A simple, easy-to-follow guide on how small changes (tiny habits) can lead to big, life-changing results over time.

books.title: Charlotte's Web
books.author: E.B. White
books.content: The heartwarming story of a pig named Wilbur and his friendship with a barn spider named Charlotte, who saves him from the butcher.

books.title: Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat
books.author: Samin Nosrat
books.content: A cookbook that teaches the four main elements of cooking, showing how to improve any dish by mastering these simple ideas.

books.title: Into the Wild
books.author: Jon Krakauer
books.content: The true story of a young man who gives up his comfortable life, donates all his money, and tries to live alone in the Alaskan wilderness.
